sections.heading: Pupils; health inspections; violation; penalty
sections.text: Any person violating any of the provisions of sections 79-248 to 79-252 shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor.SourceLaws 1919, c. 241, § 6, p. 1005;C.S.1922, § 6541;C.S.1929, § 79-2118;R.S.1943, § 79-2127;Laws 1949, c. 256, § 176, p. 749;Laws 1977, L
